description: The Revel Tall is a little bit casual, and a little bit campfire, and everything you’re looking for in a boot designed to help you relax, recover, and repeat as necessary. A slip-on boot at the intersection of cozy and comfortable. The Revel Tall takes Chaco’s APMA-certified comfort and LUVSEAT™ arch-support and marries it with warm fleece-lined felted uppers to create the perfect, everyday cozy boot. Featuring a clean simple design with hi-pile fleece styling in the back to bring the comforts of home on the go. Totally Vegan.
name: Revel Tall - Womens

specs.value: Made with a soft fleece lining and felted upper
Podiatrist accepted footbed promotes arch support and healthy alignment
2.0 MM lug outsole for no slip traction
